name: The Harlen's Artifact (20/21)
description:
The Harlen's Artifact

Controls:

ASWD = Moving
Mouse = looking around
Mouse1 = Attack
Spacebar = Activate Super Ability

R = Restart

Objective:

Fight through randomly generated rooms and kill enemies as you progress through the levels and get an item between levels.

CheatCodes:

F1 = Free Win
